About Thanks for using my timetable app! This is my first project and I worked quite a bit into making it look as neat as possible, however there are many improvements to be made. You can email me at the address below for feedback or suggestions, until then I hope the app will serve you well! Add cards by pressing the + button in the toolbar.\nEdit cards by tapping them.\nWrite notes for each card and see all the notes in the notes menu.\nLock cards to be unable to edit them.\nOrganize your timetable for multiple weeks or multiple people by assigning different labels per card.\nColor your app from the settings page however you like.\nSleep well and don\'t overwork yourself! Things you can do Developer Developed with enthusiasm by Craciun Ioan-Flaviu.\nEmail: jack92657@gmail.com Card color No need for hint Text color Background Color Accent Color sans-serif-medium All Subtasks TODO: %s Deadline: %s' There is a reminder set at %s No deadline set Label: Labels: Delete Label Edit Labels Label name: Add label Cancel Edit Label Add subtask Subtasks Deadline: Reminder: Reset Set Reminder A date and time in the future is required Reset Reminder You have removed the reminder for the card You have set a reminder Update Day of week: %s Visibility
